name: defibrillator
description:
you're not broken, you just need to find your feet.

a game about freaking out and hurting a dear friend. i made this as a self-therapy tool, and it won't be relatable for everyone. talk to the ghost that lives inside of the machine. go on, it wants to help you.

you just have to let go of the bloody knife.

playtime is less than 5 minutes

originally a patreon exclusive in june 2019. title image credits to burak kostak.
